title: Jonathan Agnew
summary: Jonathan Philip Agnew, MBE, DL (born 4 April 1960) is an English cricket broadcaster and a former professional cricketer. He was born in Macclesfield, Cheshire, and educated at Uppingham School. He is nicknamed "Aggers", and, less commonly, "Spiro" â€“ the latter, according to Debrett's Cricketers' Who's Who, after former US Vice-President Spiro Agnew.[1]
